PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-04382012-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CH,  PSC
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectAppointment or Deployment of Alternates Regulations
PrecisAPPOINTMENT OR DEPLOYMENT OF ALTERNATES REGULATIONS prescribing that an alternate (1) must submit an irrevocable resignation from the public service to take effect no later than five days from the day on which they are appointed or deployed to the position of the opting employee; (2) must not perform the duties of the position of the opting employee; and (3) ceases to be an employee in the public service on the day referred to in the irrevocable resignation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0083 Publication Date: 2012-04-25
